reviews.review: Absolute must see for fans of the MCU

Avengers Infinity War is a beautiful culmination of the past ten years of the MCU.
This movie has the perfect balance of Humor, Action, Darkens, and wonder. And one of the most, if not the most, dramatic movie endings in history.
Thanos is a brilliant villain who has good intentions, but is terrifying, 
Despite yielding the biggest comic book movie cast ever, Infinity War does not feel jumble, crammed, or overstuff. Everybody has their moment to shine!

Infinity War is the best marvel movie and Thanos is the best villain. The performance that Josh Brolin gives through motion capture is outstanding. And the score, visual effects and everything else was top notch. You did it again Marvel!!!
Pacing was a little weird but oh my gosh, that ending

Dopo 10 anni di preparazione finalmente possiamo gustarci il blockbuster per eccellenza, l'unione di tutti i personaggi Marvel e la semi-conclusione di un enorme ciclo produttivo. Il film è immenso, pieno di personaggi importanti che si scontrano con un nuovo e potente nemico dall'inizio alla fine. E' un tripudio di azione ed effetti speciali che coinvolge e non annoia mai. Poteva sembrare difficile riuscire a coinvolgere così tanti personaggi pur mantenendo una narrazione sensata e coerente, ma i fratelli Russo riescono a bilanciare alla perfezione tutti i famosi supereroi, creando un vero e proprio gioiello per tutti gli amanti del genere. Il villain principale è molto convincente e motivato, a differenza di tanti altri film del genere finalmente ha una motivazione concreta in cui ci si può quasi schierare. Il tipico umorismo generale è sempre presente e, senza esagerare, diverte e alleggerisce l'umore dello spettatore nei momenti più delicati. Si svolgono enormi passi avanti nella narrazione, che sfocia in un finale clamoroso e totalmente inaspettato. Ora non si può prevedere cosa hanno in serbo per noi i produttori della casa di produzione, ma certamente non vedo l'ora di poter vedere i prossimi sviluppi di tutta la narrazione. Intanto, questo è uno dei migliori film della Marvel, e sicuramente tra i migliori di tutto questo genere cinematografico.
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be
A great movie that has been building up for ten years. It may have not been as enjoyable for people who don't really follow the MCU, but for many fans this is probably the best Marvel movie to date

(I promise this review will not have any spoilers in it, #ThanosDemandsYourSilence)
Avengers: Infinity War was an amazing movie, the long awaited movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe including nearly every character from the MCU line up, Even though I'm pretty much still a newbie to the MCU I have seen all the movies in the MCU starting from 2008's Iron Man to the latest ones being both this year's Black Panther and of course Avengers: Infinity War.
The long wait I must say was really worth it all, but I will say after I watched it and stayed for the end credit scene as usual for an MCU movie, I was left questioning what just freaking happened?
This movie has a great story, great characters, great set of cast members old and new, great action scenes, the CGI was great, using all the stuff that Marvel has got in having it be great, great music, and even funny jokes.
It may have left me questioning stuff but from what this movie did I have to say that it was done pretty interestingly especially when we finally get to Avengers 4 next year which will likely tie up some issues Phrase 3 of the MCU had of when events took place.
I highly recommend everyone watches it the moment they can before it's too late, this is what the MCU has been leading up to the 10 years, and I'm happy to have been one of those to be viewing it, even if I haven't been watching them property until 2016.
I highly recommend this movie to fans of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, fans of Marvel in general, fans of Super Hero movies, fans of the Avengers, and fans of any Live Action CGI movie in the modern day, I mainly recommend you watch the previous MCU movies as well just so lots of things make even more sense.
I give Avengers: Infinity War a 10 out of 10, an amazing movie and once you see it, it'll blow you away as destiny arrives for both the Avengers and the whole world the MCU is set in as a whole.
Great movie, although hard to swallow
